title: Packet loss issues(i think its packet loss)
body:
I had a nice game with Kayle early on(thankfully we won) but mid game i started experiencing heavy amounts of packet loss,Health bars wouldn't show properly,Casting animations wouldn't play,auto attacks would have no animation but still do damage,There was a delay on a champion showing up if they came into my vision range

I normally run smooth with no noticeable delay on 200-300 ping so i assume this is packet loss

replies.body:
This definitely sounds like classic symptoms of packet loss. Inbound packets are tiny packages of information that tell your client what's happening server-side and then your client displays it. If these packets get heavily delayed or lost along the way, your client can miss displaying actions exactly as they happen and will catch up when the next set of packets finally arrive. This would be seen as erratic jumps in actions or actions missing completely, as you've described. 

Packet loss can often be caused by local network configurations that prevent your connection from remaining steady during the game. It can also be caused by issues along your route to the server. The guide that Rineyy provided will take you through the first layer of troubleshooting, but if you still see issues I definitely recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech specialists as suggested. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
